description: React component for sending notifications via a form, including form state management, API call to send notifications, and UI rendering.

methods.name: Notifications()
methods.description: React functional component rendering a notification sending form with state management and API integration.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Asynchronous function to handle form submission, send notification via API, and update UI status.

ctags.name: submit
ctags.pattern: /^        <form onSubmit={submit} style={{ border: "1px solid #e9ecef", padding: 12, borderRadius:/

fields.name: <form onSubmit={submit} style={{ border: "1px solid #e9ecef", padding: 12, borderRadius:/
